file.name: api-v1.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Todo List API
  version: v1
tags:
  - name: todoList
    description: Manage the todo list
servers:
- url: /api/v1
paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: List all todos
      operationId: todos
      tags:
        - todoList
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An array of todos
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
    post:
      summary: Add a new todo
      operationId: addTodo
      tags:
        - todoList
      requestBody:
        description: Todo to add
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
          headers:
            Location:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: uri
              description: URL of created todo
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestDetails'
    put:
      summary: Overwrite all todos
      operationId: overwriteTodos
      tags:
        - todoList
      requestBody:
        description: Todos to overwrite existing ones
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestDetails'
        '409':
          description: Conflict
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                description: Error message
    delete:
      summary: Delete all todos
      operationId: deleteTodos
      tags:
        - todoList
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
  /{id}:
    get:
      summary: Get a todo
      operationId: todo
      tags:
        - todoList
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the todo to retrieve
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A todo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestDetails'
        '404':
          description: Not found
    put:
      summary: Update a todo
      operationId: updateTodo
      tags:
        - todoList
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the todo to update
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      requestBody:
        description: Todo to overwrite the existing one
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestDetails'
        '404':
          description: Not found
    delete:
      summary: Delete a todo
      operationId: deleteTodo
      tags:
        - todoList
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the todo to delete
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/BadRequestDetails'
        '404':
          description: Not found
components:
  schemas:
    Todo:
      type: object
      description: Todo item
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          description: ID of a persisted todo item
        version:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          description: Version of a persisted todo item
        title:
          type: string
          description: Todo title or description
          minLength: 4
        completed:
          type: boolean
          description: Completed flag
      required:
      - title
      - completed
    BadRequestDetails:
      type: object
      description: Error details
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
          description: Error message
        path:
          type: string
          description: Path to erroneous parameter or request attribute
        rejectedValue:
          description: Rejected value of erroneous attribute
      required:
      - message

Error: notImplemented: path "/": put: responses: 409: contents: unsupported content types: [text/plain]
